column4: Hey, I need help. I just installed 8.10, and everything seems to be fine except for the face that I can't find my wireless network. I can see everyone house around me, but just not mine. All other laptops in my house can connect to mine, but I can't even detect it. Any idea what is wrong?

Hey, I need help. I just installed 8.10, and everything seems to be fine except for the face that I can't find my wireless network. I can see everyone house around me, but just not mine. All other laptops in my house can connect to mine, but I can't even detect it. Any idea what is wrong?
did you try just entering your details manually?
: I have tried letting it use the old info, tried entering it manually, and even deleted it from the list. It doesn't show up as a network around me
all I can suggest is that you enter your wireless SSID and other details directly in System -> Preferences -> Network Configuration -> wireless
: What is SSID?
the name your wireless network shows up as
: Didn't work. It still doesn't show up as a wireless network :( Out of ideas?
did you tell it to connect automatically in your network configuration?
: Yes, I did. It seems like it can't even detect the network to even aoutomaticly connect
what happens on reboot?  You don't get connected?
: Nope. But it does detect all other wireless networks around except mine. I checked mine out, tested other laptops in the house, and reset the modem. Still will not show up on only my computer.
after you added your network manually to network configuration and rebooted, it did not work?
: No, but I will try to reboot again and come back here if you think that would be a good shot to try again.
give it a shot, I don't understand exactly how nm works
: Ok, rebooting now.
: Nope, still can't detect my network.
don't know then
: Yes, this is a duel core intel laptop
: Make sure what is turned on? If you mean the wireless network conection program, yes, it is. It connected imidiatly to my neighbor's wireless when I turned the laptop on
that was SeaPhor
: What is SeaPhor?
he's a user of this channel trying to help you :)
